articles.author: Josh O'Brien
articles.title: Arsenal transfer round-up: David Raya deal finally confirmed as Man City star eyed - The Mirror
articles.description: The Gunners are making more moves in the transfer market with another signing and could even see more before the window closes at the end of this month, as well as a notable outgoing
articles.content:
Arsenal's summer of spending continues as Mikel Arteta's men land their fourth signing of the summer in goalkeeper David Raya.
 The Gunners enjoyed a successful start to the 2023/24 Premier League s… [+3148 chars]
